CustomField.description: Image to display for case type so case records can display as tiles in a CMS collection on a community. Each time you create a new case we default an image based on case type. See process builder for the process: Set Case Type Image" (Brian Murphy)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Image to display for case type so case records can display as tiles in a CMS collection on a community. Each time you create a new case we default an image based on case type. See process builder for the process: "Set Case Type Image"
CustomField.label: Case Type Image URL
